typeDescriptions.typeString: function (uint256,uint256) view external returns (contract IAlphaReceiver[] memory,uint256[] memory)

documentation.text:
@dev distributes Alpha token to the receiver from the last distributed block
 to the latest block forrowing the release rules
@dev the selector of Alpha release rules

@dev emitted on update rule selector
 @param ruleSelector the new rule selector

 @param _ruleSelector the release rule selector

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (uint256,uint256) view external returns (contract IAlphaReceiver[] memory,uint256[] memory)

documentation.text:
@dev distributes Alpha token to the receiver from the last distributed block
 to the latest block forrowing the release rules

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

poke().details: distributes Alpha token to the receiver from the last distributed block to the latest block forrowing the release rules

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setReleaseRuleSelector(address).details: set the release rule selector of the distributor

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

lastPokeBlock.details: the last block the distributor distribute Alpha token to the receiver

ruleSelector.details: the selector of Alpha release rules

userdoc.notice: Implements distributor to poke Alpha token reward to the receiver follow by the Alpha release rules
